Text: I'm a huuuge vinyl fan but I can't see downloading vinyl rips that are mp3 at 160kbs. You really lose a ton of quality by doing this. 320kb or higher it has to be, and ogg at the least. FLAC or WAV at best. I know it saves space by doing mp3, but you lose too much of the sound.
No shit sherlock. So go and buy vinyls......
